title: How to prepare your home for sale
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/House buying
description: Episode of Series "The Home and garden video series". Getting the right price when selling a home can depend on the attention to detail and careful preparations by the owners. This program shows how certain areas can be improved to maximise the chances of selling a home. This program is American and some of the safety standards may not apply, and the advice given is meant as a guide, not as a prescriptive recommendation.The accompanying booklet provides a valuable checklist of items which need to be considered when preparing the home for sale.
related_objects: Series; S01258; The Home and garden video series; Active; 1990
